message.content:
Monday:
- Breakfast: Oatmeal with banana and strawberries topped with chia seeds
- Lunch: Quinoa salad with mixed veggies, chickpeas, olives, and lemon dressing
- Dinner: Grilled chicken with sweet potato mash and sautéed spinach

Tuesday:
- Breakfast: Avocado toast on gluten-free bread with tomatoes and bell peppers
- Lunch: Baked tofu with broccoli, carrots, and brown rice
- Dinner: Stir-fried tempeh with kale, mushrooms, and quinoa

Wednesday:
- Breakfast: Smoothie made from mango, pineapple, spinach, coconut water, and flaxseeds
- Lunch: Black bean burger with mixed greens and beetroot on gluten-free bun
- Dinner: Baked fish with zucchini noodles and cauliflower rice

Thursday:
- Breakfast: Chia seed pudding with blueberries and coconut milk
- Lunch: Lentil soup with whole wheat bread
- Dinner: Tofu stir-fry with bell peppers, onions, and brown rice

Friday:
- Breakfast: Fruit salad made from apples, oranges, kiwi, and grapes
- Lunch: Veggie wrap with lettuce, tomatoes, cucumber, and hummus
- Dinner: Roasted vegetable lasagna with gluten-free pasta sheets

Saturday:
- Breakfast: Green smoothie made from spinach, banana, almond milk, and dates (make sure to remove any almond residues if the blender was previously used for almond-based items)
- Lunch: Quinoa tabbouleh with cherry tomatoes, cucumber, parsley, and mint
- Dinner: Grilled veggie skewers with basmati rice and tzatziki sauce

Sunday:
- Breakfast: Banana oat pancakes topped with blueberries and maple syrup (use date syrup instead of honey)
- Lunch: Lentil soup with whole wheat bread
- Dinner: Baked salmon with roasted potatoes and asparagus

Remember to stay hydrated throughout the day by drinking plenty of water and herbal teas. Snack on fresh fruits or unsalted nuts (other than almonds, pistachios, and cashews) to keep your energy levels up. Enjoy your healthy meal plan!
